name: Falsifier Fog
movement: hovers and flies at 60 feet, walk 0 feet
description: A Huge mass of swirling fog with chilling cold emanating from it, capable of instilling fear and confusion. It appears as indistinguishable fog when motionless.
memorable: Its abilities to create horrific illusions and manipulate the battlefield while providing cover make it a formidable force.
goals: To instill fear and manipulate opponents through its intimidating presence and psychic attacks.
relations: Other undead creatures or foes that thrive in confusion and fear may accompany it.
environment: Typically found in dark, misty areas where it can blend in with natural fog or smoke.
strengths: Immunity to poison damage and conditions like exhaustion, paralysis, plus resistance to elemental damage and nonmagical attacks.
weaknesses: Weak Strength score makes it ineffective in direct physical confrontations.
attacks: Utilizes chill attacks that deal cold damage and psychic damage through horrific illusions, affecting the minds of those nearby.
most_powerful_ability: Horrific Illusions, which causes creatures to become frightened and potentially suffer short-term madness.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to sense creatures in its vicinity without sight.
additional_information: Can occupy the same space as other creatures, offering three-quarters cover.
Limited Telepathy allows for strategic communication with trapped foes.
Can appear indistinguishable from regular fog while motionless.
test_queries: huge undead fog creature instilling fear
cunning fog that creates horrific illusions
mass of fog that causes short-term madness
chaotic evil fog creature with telepathy
